targets.expr:
sum(sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_tablespace_size{alias=~"$alias",}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
    sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents="PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)
) by (job, alias)
-
sum(sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias",}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
    sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents="PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)
) by (job, alias)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_tablespace_size{alias=~"$alias"}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents=~"PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)

(sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_tablespace_size{alias=~"$alias"}[24h])) without(__name__) - on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
 sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias"}[24h])) without(__name__)
) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents=~"PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias"}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents=~"PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_percent{alias=~"$alias"}[24h])) without(__name__)
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents=~"PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)

( sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias"}[24h])) without(__name__) - on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
  sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias"}[24h] offset $diff_intv2)) without(__name__))
* on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents=~"PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_tablespace_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$top_pct"}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$top_pct"}[24h])) without(__name__)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$top_pct"}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$top_pct"}[24h])) without(__name__)

(sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_tablespace_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$top_pct"}[24h])) without(__name__) - on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
 sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$top_pct"}[24h])) without(__name__)
) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$top_pct"}[24h])) without(__name__)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_tablespace_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$tablespace"}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$tablespace"}[24h])) without(__name__)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$tablespace"}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$tablespace"}[24h])) without(__name__)

(sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_tablespace_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$tablespace"}[24h])) without(__name__) - on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
 sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$tablespace"}[24h])) without(__name__)
) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$tablespace"}[24h])) without(__name__)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents!~"PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)

 sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias"}[24h])) without(__name__)
) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents!~"PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents!~"PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_percent{alias=~"$alias"}[24h])) without(__name__)
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", contents!~"PERMANENT"}[24h])) without(__name__)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_tablespace_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$other_space"}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$other_space"}[24h])) without(__name__)

sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$other_space"}[24h])) without(__name__) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$other_space"}[24h])) without(__name__)

(sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_tablespace_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$other_space"}[24h])) without(__name__) - on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
 sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_usage_used_space{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$other_space"}[24h])) without(__name__)
) * on (job, alias, tablespace_name )
sum(last_over_time(oracledb_tablespace_block_size{alias=~"$alias", tablespace_name=~"$other_space"}[24h])) without(__name__)
